ComicInfo.Summary:
*Overview* Hulk and members of the Pantheon take off to space in the Pantheon's shuttle to rescue Atalanta from Trauma.
Atalanta manages to delay Trauma's star ship long enough for her teammates to reach it.
Hulk fights Trauma on outer space, until Trauma gets in the ship, which exists at the speed of light. The warp grabs the Hulk and the Silver Surfer, who had showed up to help the Hulk sent by Doctor Strange.
ComicInfo.Tags: Troyjans,Space,Rick Jones,Achilles,Ulysses,Betty Ross,Trauma,Atalanta,Nevada,Hulk,Hector,Doctor Strange,Lord Armageddon,Cassiopea,Prometheus,Reno,Pantheon,Silver Surfer,The Mount,Marlo Chandler-Jones,The Troyjan War.
ComicInfo.Title: The Troyjan War, Part 2: Blast Off
